rukus.text: 23|93|Ie,`omo yo, anata ga kare-ra ni yakusoku shita koto (chobatsu) o, moshi watashi (no zaisei-chu) ni shimesa rerunara,
23|94|omo yo, watashi o aku o okonau min no naka ni, hairenaide kudasai.'
23|95|Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ni keikoku shita mono o, anata ni shimesu koto wa tashika ni dekiru.
23|96|Zenko ni yotte, aku o gekitai seyo. Ware wa kare-ra no iu koto o jukuchi shite iru.
23|97|Soshite (inotte) ii nasai. `Omo yo, akuma-tachi no sasayaki ni taishi, anata no kago o negaimasu.
23|98|Omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi ni chikadzukanai yo, anata no kago o negaimasu.'
23|99|Daga shi ga otozureru to, kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi o (nama ni) okuri ki shite kudasai.
23|100|Watashi ga nokoshite kita mono ni tsuite yoi okonai o shimasu.' Kesshite sode wanai. Sore wa kare no kojo ni suginai. Yomigaeri no hi made, kare-ra no ushironi wa modorenai shoheki ga aru.
23|101|Rabba ga fuka reru toki, sonohi, kare-ra no ma no sho kankei no kizuna wa todae, tagaini towanaidearou.
23|102|Sore de hakari ga (zenko no tame) omoi-sha-tachi wa, shijo no kofuku o eru.
23|103|Mata hakari ga karui-sha-tachi wa, tamashi o ushinai, jigoku ni eien ni sumu.
23|104|Hi wa kare-ra no kao o kogashi, sono Chu de haguki o mukidasu.
23|105|(Kare-ra ni iwa reyou. ) `Ware no shirushi ga anata gata ni dokuju sa renakatta no ka,nanoni sore o usodearu to shita no ka.'
23|106|Kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa fuun ni uchi make, mayotte imashita.
23|107|Omo yo, watashi-tachi o koko kara dashite kudasai. Moshimo nao watashi-tachi ga (aku ni) kaerunaraba, hontoni fugi no todesu.'
23|108|Kare wa ose rareyou. `Sono naka ni iyashime rarete haitte shimae. Ware ni monowoiu na.
23|109|Hontoni ware no shimo be no nakaniha, ko itte ita ichidan ga aru. “Omo yo, watashi-tachi o yurushi, jihi o ataete kudasai. Anata wa mottomo sugureta jihi o ataeru katadesu. ”
23|110|Daga anata gata wa, kare-ra o waraigusa ni shita. Anata gata wa, kare-ra o waratte iru ma ni, ware o nenjiru no o wasureru koto ni natta.
23|111|Hontoni kare-ra ga taeshinonda koto ni yori, kyo ware wa mukuita. Kare-ra koso seiko shita monodearu.'
23|112|Kare wa ose rareyou. `Anata gata wa, chijo ni nan-nen taizai shite ita no ka.'
23|113|Kare-ra wa moshiageyou. `Watashi-tachi wa tsuitachi ka, tsuitachi no ichibubun taizai shite imashita. Kanjoyaku (tenshi) ni o toi kudasai.'
23|114|Kare wa ose rareyou. `Anata gata no taizai wa tsukanoma nisuginai, anata gataga (kono koto o) shitteitanaraba
23|115|anata gata wa, ware ga tawamure ni anata gata o tsukutta to demo kangaete ita no ka. Mata anata gata wa, ware ni kisa renai to kangaete ita no ka.'
23|116|Arra wa, tattokute kedakai, shinjitsu no ojadearu. Koketsuna gyokuza no omo o oite soto ni wa kami wanai.
23|117|Arra to issho ni, nani no shoko mo nai soto no kami ni inoru mono no keisan wa omo no omoto ni aru dakedearu. Hontoni fushin-sha-tachi wa, kachinuku koto wa dekinaidearou.
23|118|(Inotte) iuga i. `Omo yo, o yurushi o atae, jihi o ataete kudasai. Anata wa mottomo sugureta jihi o ataeru kata de ara remasu.'
